content: विवृत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Displayed, manifested, expressed. {@--2@} Evident, clear, open. {@--3@} Uncovered, exposed, laid bare. {@--4@} Opened, unclosed; bare, open. {@--5@} Proclaimed. {@--6@} Expounded, explained, commented upon. {@--7@} Expanded, spread out. {@--8@} Extensive, large, spacious. {@--9@} Bare, barren (as ground). --तं Open articulation. --तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Openly.
